channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jimmy Cliff, Singer Who Helped Bring Reggae to Global Audience, Dies at 81
item.description: His Grammy-winning records as well as his starring role in the cult movie “The Harder They Come” in 1972 boosted a career spanning seven decades.

item.title: Trump and China's leader Xi Jinping hold a call and discuss trade, Taiwan and Ukraine
item.description: Monday's call was the latest in a flurry of diplomatic and trade parries between the U.S. and China over tariffs and technology export restrictions.

item.title: How Is QAnon Reacting to the Epstein Files?
item.description: It has a little something to do with Donald Trump.

item.title: Amid GPS and Ride-Hailing, the Allure of London’s Black Cab Endures
item.description: In a world of GPS and car-hailing apps, some Londoners still want to drive a traditional black cab. First, they must memorize thousands of city street...

item.title: Pentagon investigates Democratic senator for telling troops to refuse 'illegal orders'
item.description: The Pentagon says it's opening an investigation into Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly in the wake of a video of Democratic lawmakers urging servicemembers not ...

item.title: 'Just Google' me: Slender Man stabber is recaptured after fleeing her group home
item.description: Geyser and a friend lured a classmate to the woods and stabbed her 19 times in 2014. She moved from a psychiatric facility to a group home in Wisconsi...

item.title: Pentagon Opens Inquiry Into Senator Mark Kelly Over What Hegseth Calls ‘Seditious’ Video
item.description: The defense secretary called the senator’s remarks urging troops not to follow illegal orders “despicable, reckless, and false.”

item.title: New poll shows Latino support for Trump is slipping after gains in 2024
item.description: The Pew Research Center's survey of Latinos show majorities disapprove of the president, especially his policies on the economy and immigration.

item.title: Judge tosses Comey, James cases after finding prosecutor unlawfully appointed
item.description: The judge's decision on the appointment of Lindsey Halligan marks a significant setback to efforts to go after the president's perceived political ene...

item.title: U.S. and Ukraine Hail Progress on Peace Plan to End War With Russia
item.description: Washington and Kyiv said that “highly productive” discussions over a proposal to end the war between Russia and Ukraine would continue.

item.title: Army Chief Says France Must ‘Accept Losing Our Children,’ Igniting Uproar
item.description: The furor erupted as President Emmanuel Macron is expected to present a plan for paid, voluntary military service to bolster the armed forces against ...

item.title: Gaza Humanitarian Foundation Is Closing
item.description: The Gaza Humanitarian Foundation said it had succeeded in delivering million of meals in the war-torn enclave, but some Palestinian were killed trying...

item.title: Amid GPS and Ride-Hailing, the Allure of London’s Black Cab Endures
item.description: In a world of GPS and car-hailing apps, some Londoners still want to drive a traditional black cab. First, they must memorize thousands of city street...

item.title: U.S. and Ukraine Hail Progress on Peace Plan to End War With Russia
item.description: Washington and Kyiv said that “highly productive” discussions over a proposal to end the war between Russia and Ukraine would continue.

item.title: How the Peace Plan Looks to Ukraine and Russia
item.description: Our correspondents discuss the prospects for President Trump’s plan to end the war.
